name: Miner 2049er Remake
description:
A GameMaker Studio 2 remake of one of my favorite games of all time, Miner 2049er which was released by Big Five Software in 1982. All ten levels are here and the features of the levels are in as well. It does not play identical to the original but I may tweak that in the future.

Use arrow keys to move and space bar to jump. Use number keys to use elevators. Also works with a controller.

Miner 2049er on the Atari 800 was one of the first games I played as a kid and remains one of my favorite games of all time.  It's amazing what developers were able to accomplish with 8k and 16k cartridges back in the day.
